channel.title: Milly Wrote it
channel.description: Recent content on Milly Wrote it

item.title: 007. University or Kindergarten 🧒
item.description: What happens when you start treating your team like the adults they are?

item.title: 006. Autonomy 👣
item.description: What does standing back and letting the team own the work actually mean?

item.title: 005. Friends 👯‍♀️
item.description: If you’ve also recently transitioned to Engineering Manager from Individual Contributor you may find yourself in the precarious position of managing ex-peers and friends.

item.title: 004. Hiring 👩‍💼
item.description: Everyone and their dog will tell you that hiring is hard in the tech industry. What if I told you the problem isn’t that it’s too hard… it’s that it’s too easy…

item.title: 003. The Man 👴
item.description: With International Women’s Day upon us once more, I muse more about what transparency actually means…

item.title: 002. Radiator ☢️
item.description: In the musical Hamilton, they sing about “being in the room where it happened”. As Engineering Manager, I’ve now finally found myself in “the room” where a lot of talk happens. Decisions get made, strategies are strategised and plans are hatched…

item.title: 001. Transition 🦋
item.description: Life is all about change. I had never thought I would be a software engineer let alone an engineering manager…
